title: SENIORS?? LOW INCOME  APTS AVAILABLE!!!
posting_body: NOW ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS FOR STUDIO AND ONE BEDROOM APARTMENTS!!!
ARE YOU A SENIOR AGED 62 AND OVER???
CALL ROBERT HOLMES MANOR YOU NEW HOME TODAY!!!
Enjoy the comfort and serenity offered at Robert Holmes Manor 5100 Brush St. Detroit, MI 48202.
Robert Holmes Manor is located in Detroit's Midtown with access to many hidden treasures in the city.
Designated for Senior Citizens aged 62 years and older.
Robert Holmes Manor offers clean and affordable suites, with a variety of amenities that add comfort and security.
***Rental Assistance available for those who qualify***
Robert Holmes Manor is accessible near most major interstates: I-94 and I-75 and is minutes away from the main campus for Detroit Medical Center.
Just minutes from Downtown Detroit, Robert Holmes Manor is near most of Detroit's Main Attractions!
Robert Holmes Manor is located in the heart of Detroit's Midtown.
Near attractions major attractions, such as:
* Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History
To inquire or to apply, please contact us!!!
Applications are available on site anytime!!!
Call or email for an appointment!!!
